goals: Fix both critical security findings: RCE in integration hooks (c1-1) and unauthenticated auth API (c1-2)
Eliminate all HIGH-severity CVEs: Jinja2, cryptography, python-jose, passlib + credential/path/SQL/SSRF fixes
Upgrade core framework stack (FastAPI, pydantic, SQLAlchemy) to stable/current
completed: fix-deps-001: Upgraded jinja2 to 3.1.6 (CVE-2024-56201, CVE-2024-56326)
fix-deps-002: Upgraded cryptography to >=44.0.1 (CVE-2024-12797)
fix-deps-003: Upgraded python-jose / migrated to authlib
fix-deps-005: Upgraded opentelemetry from beta to stable 1.x
fix-deps-007: Upgraded fastapi >=0.115.0 and uvicorn >=0.34.0
fix-deps-006-v2: Upgraded weasyprint >=65.0 (SSRF fix)
fix-deps-008-v2: Upgraded pydantic >=2.11.0
fix-deps-009: Upgraded passlib (abandoned) to argon2-cffi
fix-deps-010: Upgraded celery to >=5.5.0
fix-deps-011: Upgraded redis to >=5.2.0
fix-deps-012: Upgraded sqlalchemy to >=2.0.40
fix-deps-013: Upgraded alembic
fix-deps-014: Upgraded shapely to >=2.1.0
fix-deps-015: Added urllib3>=2.0 explicit dependency (CVE-2023-43804/45803)

hotfix-ci-22475514655: CI hotfix (completed)
hotfix-ci-22475600143: CI hotfix (completed)
fix-security-c1-2: Added require_permission to all 21 auth.py endpoints (CRITICAL auth bypass)
fix-security-c1-3: credential_crypto raises RuntimeError when CREDENTIAL_ENCRYPTION_KEY absent
fix-security-c1-4: Removed ssl_verify=False from all RouterOS connections
fix-security-c1-5: Added auth deps to PUT /settings/gis and /settings/geocoding
fix-security-c1-6: Fixed path traversal in delete_avatar() using Path.relative_to()
fix-security-c1-7: RADIUS SQL table-name allowlist validation
fix-security-c1-8: Added slowapi IP rate limiting to login endpoint
fix-security-c1-9: RADIUS SQL f-string table injection (enforcement.py)
fix-security-c1-10: OpenBao SSRF / path traversal fix
fix-security-c1-11: Connector health check SSRF guard added
fix-security-c1-12: Legacy file path traversal fixed
fix-security-c1-13: Export file path traversal fixed
fix-security-c1-14: S3/MinIO hardcoded credentials removed
fix-security-c1-15: MySQL default empty password removed from config.py
fix-security-c1-16: JWT secret minimum length enforced at startup
fix-security-c1-17: Lockout timing enumeration side-channel mitigated
fix-security-c1-18: Backup path startswith bypass fixed (Path.relative_to)
fix-security-c1-19: SMS webhook SSRF guard added
fix-security-c1-20: Internal services http:// scheme warnings added
fix-security-c1-21: RouterOS plaintext_login disabled
fix-security-c1-22: RADIUS noqa:S608 suppressions documented with rationale
fix-security-c1-23: Webhook delivery SSRF guard added
fix-security-c1-24: Nextcloud Talk SSRF via user-supplied base_url fixed
fix-security-c1-25: Audit auth API key scope bypass fixed
fix-security-c1-26: Stored XSS in legal document sanitized
fix-security-c1-27: Stored XSS in contract template sanitized
fix-security-c1-28: Prometheus /metrics endpoint protected
fix-security-c1-29: WireGuard peer config IDOR fixed
